games.title: Obby Easy Grow!
games.description: Test your skills in a race against time!Adjust your character's size dynamically using the on-screen slider or the mouse wheel to navigate through obstacles and challenges. Hold the right mouse button to freely rotate the camera and explore your surroundings. Can you master the mechanics and complete the game before time runs out?
games.howToPlayText:
PC:
Shift - show cursor
WASD - move.
Space - jump.
TAB - pause.
F - push the enemy
Mouse wheel forward/backward - change size

Phone:
Use the game interface

games.title: Candy for capybara
games.description:
Capybara Wants a Candy!
Match identical marmalades to create bigger candies and earn coins.
Use the crane to grab delicious treats for your capybara!

Game Features:
36 levels with increasing difficulty ‚Äì from simple puzzles to challenging candy combinations.

Endless high-score mode ‚Äì compete with friends for the best candy-matching skills.

Jelly physics ‚Äì watch candies bounce, stick, and deform as they collide.

Adorable pet ‚Äì the capybara reacts to your success (happy when fed, sad when you miss).
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
Marmalade Candy Control:
üì± Mobile:

Touch & drag to move candies ‚Äì release to drop them.
üñ•Ô∏è Desktop:

Mouse: Click & drag, release to throw.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (‚Üê ‚Üí ‚Üë ‚Üì) + Space to drop.

Crane Control:
üì± Mobile:

Slide your finger to move the crane ‚Äì release to grab candy.
üñ•Ô∏è Desktop:

Mouse: Move cursor + click to grab.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (‚Üê ‚Üí) + Space to capture.

games.title: Stack Ball 3D
games.description: Break through countless platforms with the ball, but avoid hitting black spots or you'll lose. Try to hit as many platforms as you can to gain speedboost and become unstoppable
games.howToPlayText: Controls: tap the phone screen, or press the left mouse button to make the ball start advancing downwards.

games.title: Pop It 3D
games.description: Players take turns pressing down any number of bubbles in a single row and consecutively. The player who presses the last bubble loses the game.
games.howToPlayText: Click or tap on the cells you want to pop

games.title: Mindblow
games.description:
Welcome to Mindblow: Guess the Word! Experience a word-guessing game like no other, where every image cleverly hides a word. Unlike other games, this game isn‚Äôt just a mix of stock images, but we've carefully created each level‚Äôs image to challenge your brain! Discover the word through a concept creatively depicted in each picture.

A New Kind of Puzzle: Forget what you know about word quiz games. In Mindblow: Guess the Word, each image has a special word for you to guess. It‚Äôs not just about looking at the picture, but understanding the clever idea behind it.
games.howToPlayText:
From easy peasy to brain-busters, we‚Äôve got levels for every player. Earn coins for right guesses and use them for hints when stuck.
Guess the Word handy on your device. New levels are added to Mindblow every month, so there‚Äôs always something fresh to enjoy.
Guess the Word, start your journey of amazing pictures and satisfying word discoveries. Are you up for the challenge?
